meanings.definition: An area of open water surrounded by sea ice.
meanings.sent1: The scientists observed the polynyas from their research vessel.
meanings.sent2: The polar bears hunted for food near the polynyas.
meanings.sent3: The seals enjoyed sunbathing in the polynyas.
meanings.sent4: The polynyas were like oases in the icy desert of the Arctic Ocean.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering polynyas contrasted with the vast white ice around them.

meanings.definition: A large expanse of open water in the midst of ice.
meanings.sent1: Birds flocked to the polynyas to catch fish.
meanings.sent2: The Inuit people navigated their boats through the polynyas.
meanings.sent3: The penguins held a dance party in the polynyas.
meanings.sent4: The polynyas resembled sparkling jewels in the frozen landscape.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious polynyas beckoned explorers to uncover their secrets.
